[edit]

Potentilla , Sp. Pl. 1: 495 (1753)

Type species: Potentilla reptans , Sp. Pl. 1: 495 (1753)

Note:

[edit]

It is now accepted that a monophyletic Potentilla s.l. can include; Horkelia, Horkeliella and Ivesia, but excludes Argentina (Chen et al. 2020, Dobeš & Paule, 2010, Töpel et al., 2011 and Govaerts et al., 2022) and all accepted combinations in Potentilla s.l. are now available in the above expanded species list if required.
